text: @GrandpaSnarky @NikkiHaley tired of hearing this BS. How about quality of life of 3MIL + COVID-19 persons, or 135K + dead due to impotence of UR hero. How about Russian bounties, U support that? Kids back to school in middle of rising #s, no thought on safety. Only power important to Repubs.
